item.title: Vance Luther Boelter sought in fatal shooting of Minnesota Rep. Melissa Hortman
item.description: Top Minnesota House Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband, Mark, were fatally shot in their home outside Minneapolis.

item.title: Trump gets his long-sought military parade as protests erupt nationwide
item.description: Outside of Washington, D.C., thousands of President Trump's opponents gathered as part of "No Kings Day" demonstrations to protest his administration'...

item.title: Military parade underway as 'No Kings' protesters around the country decry Trump
item.description: Thousands of Americans around the country are displaying another kind of power: protest.

item.title: 'Tehran will burn:' Israel and Iran strike at each other in new wave of attacks
item.description: Israel and Iran launched fresh attacks on each other, after Israel expanded its campaign against its main rival with a strike on the world's biggest g...

item.title: Putin speaks to Trump, condemns Israel's strikes on Iran, Kremlin says
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke to U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday, focusing on hostilities between Israel and Iran.
